Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Darkness.'}
{3: 'Dazed. Confused.'}
{3: 'You do not know where you are. At first, you feel like you are lying down. Then you feel something stand you up. Finally, you feel yourself being carried.'}
{3: 'Your ears are buzzing. You hear someone crying out periodically, but you can only catch just a few fragmented sentences.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Goddammit! You little...! You're nothing but trouble!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'What makes you think you can just throw your flag away?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Ngh, ow! Damn this hurts! How long has it been since I felt this much pain?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Ugh, forget it... Hey! You awake?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "...Oh, you're still conscious. You can hear me, right?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{3: 'Thunk. Thunk. You feel something hitting you, but your body only feels a weak sensation.'}
{3: 'But it does not hurt. It is just a feeling.'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: '【kuroname】 has been seriously injured! Blood-loss critical!'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "Help! It's an emergency! Where's the doctor?! Any doctor that can operate on humans?!"}
{3: 'Ngh... Really? You are injured...?'}
{3: 'Then someone must have treated you and carried you back.'}
{3: 'You struggle to open your eyes. You catch a glimpse of the gray sky and a mountain of scrapped Constructs.'}
{2: 'Scavenger Girl', 3: "(Whimpers) No... You can't! Don't die!"}
{3: 'Someone... is calling me.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'I guess desperate times call for desperate measures.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Heh... I told you. That antidote sure'd be handy at a time like this, huh?"}
{3: 'Antidote? Antidote...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory394.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "It's some kind of cardiac stimulant. One vial, one Construct. It can bring back someone from the brink of death in no time.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'You struggle to raise your hand, your throat gargling as you try to speak.'}
{3: 'Your vocal cords tremble briefly, then immediately become mute.'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "Hey! What'd 【kuroname】 just say?!"}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "I didn't catch it. What was the order?!"}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "That's not important right now... You sure there isn't a single doctor here?!"}
{2: 'Vera', 3: '(Sneers)'}
{3: 'You feel as if the red-haired Construct who is smiling gently behind the crowd of people gave out a cold sneer.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Alright, make way, you worthless pieces of scrap metal.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I won't allow the commandant to die on my watch. I'm going to need the field clinic for intensive surgery. Everyone else, get out and leave me alone!"}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "W-wait... What do you think you're doing—"}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Are you deaf? I said LEAVE! Need me to use my weapon?'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "B-but you're wounded... You need to rest..."}

{2: 'Vera', 3: "Hmph, you're worried about me? HAH! Don't even bother. Anyway, show's over. I don't care what you think of me. You wanna go back and tell everyone how bad of a person I am, by all means."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "But if you get in my way, don't be surprised when I use force."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "As for this wound, I'm fine as long as I can operate. Hell, it'll even help keep me awake."}
{3: 'The red-haired Construct makes her way through the crowd, or rather, the crowd actively clears the way.'}
{3: 'She kneels in front of you. Her rose-colored face occupies your vision.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Commandant, you want to live. Correct?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Leaning by your face, she whispers in your ear. Her red hair brushes against your cheek.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Well, then. It's your lucky day. I'll heal you right up. It's gonna hurt a bit though...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Actually, take that back... It will hurt... a lot!', 4: '1'}
